SA14bsa050_u:3: Ps_1.1 tathāgatānāṃ padam ārurukṣurāśritya ratnatrayam ādareṇa /
SA14bsa050_u:4: bodhau nidhāyāvicalaṃ manaśca kuryāt parātmavyatihāram ādau //
SA14bsa050_u:5: Ps_1.2 tataḥ paraṃ dānavidhau prayogaḥ kāryastathā lokahitonmukhena /
SA14bsa050_u:6: yathā svagātrāṇyapi yācitasya na yogasaṃkocavirūpatā syāt //
SA14bsa050_u:7: Ps_1.3 mātsaryadoṣopacayāya yat syān na tyāgacittaṃ paribṛṃhayed vā /
SA14bsa050_u:9: Ps_1.4 tad bodhisattvaḥ katham ādadīta ratnaṃ dhanaṃ vā divi vāpi rājyam /
SA14bsa050_u:11: Ps_1.5 saṃsmṛtya caryātiśayaṃ munīnāṃ tadunmukhīṃ svāmapi ca pratijñām /
SA14bsa050_u:13: Ps_1.6 yadā nisṛṣṭo jagate mayāyaṃ kāyo 'pī tattyāgakṛto 'pi dharmaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:14: bāhye tadā vastuni saṅgacittaṃ na me gajasnānam ivānurūpam //
SA14bsa050_u:15: Ps_1.7 māṃsārthino māṃsamidaṃ harantu majjānamapyuddharaṇāt tadarthī /
SA14bsa050_u:16: ahaṃ hi lokārthamidaṃ bibharmi śarīrakaṃ kiṃ bata vastu bāhyam //
SA14bsa050_u:17: Ps_1.8 yathaiva bhaiṣajyamahīruhasya tvakpattrapuṣpādi janā haranti /
SA14bsa050_u:19: Ps_1.9 tathaiva lokārthasamudyatena svalpo 'pi kāryo na mayā vikalpaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:20: duḥkhe kṛtaghne satatāśucau ca dehe parasmāyupayujyamāne //
SA14bsa050_u:21: Ps_1.10 ādhyātmike caiva mahījalādye bāhye mahābhūtagaṇe ca tulye /
SA14bsa050_u:22: idaṃ mamedaṃ na mameti ko 'yam ajñānapaṅkāṅkavidhirmayāpi //
SA14bsa050_u:23: Ps_1.11 gṛhṇīta gātrāṇyapi me yatheṣṭaṃ mā kārṣurasmin parakīyabuddhim /
SA14bsa050_u:24: yuṣmākameva svamidaṃ kimarthaṃ nātmābhimāno mama kaścidatra //
SA14bsa050_u:25: Ps_1.12 ityadbhutā yasya bhavantyabhīkṣṇaṃ saṃbuddhabhāvānuguṇā vitarkāḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:27: Ps_1.13 evaṃ sa dānapratipattiśūraḥ karoti kāye 'pi na jātvapekṣām /
SA14bsa050_u:29: Ps_1.14 viśuddhakarmā ca hitaṃ pareṣām āyāsaduḥkhena vinā karoti /
SA14bsa050_u:31: Ps_1.15 bhūyastaraṃ prāpya balaṃ sa dānāt saddharmadānena tataḥ karoti /
SA14bsa050_u:32: bhavāndhakāre bhramatāṃ janānāṃ sūryodayāt spaṣṭataraṃ prakāśam //
SA14bsa050_u:35: Ps_1.17 ityadbhutā dānamayā guṇaughā ye bodhisattvābharaṇībhavanti /
SA14bsa050_u:36: tasmāt tadīyaṃ parikarma cittaṃ dānasya kāruṇyapuraḥsarasya //
SA14bsa050_u:38: sattvā mayā cāmiṣasaṃgṛhītāḥ saddharmapātrāṇyapi me bhaveyuḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:39: Ps_1.19 ityannadānaṃ pradadāti vidvān na svargasaṃpattiparigrahāya /
SA14bsa050_u:40: pānānyapi kleśatṛṣaḥ śamāya lokasya lokārthacaro dadāti //
SA14bsa050_u:41: Ps_1.20 bauddhasya caivarddhiviceṣṭitasya nirvāṇasaukhyasya ca sarvalokaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:42: lābhī kathaṃ syāditi lokanātho yānaṃ mahāyānaratirdadāti //
SA14bsa050_u:43: Ps_1.21 saṃbuddhavarṇasya ca hemabhāso lajjāmayasyaiva ca bhūṣaṇasya /
SA14bsa050_u:45: Ps_1.22 saṃbodhimaṇḍāsanam āsanāni śayyāśca śayyātrayam īkṣamāṇaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:46: sarvajñacakṣuḥpratilabdhaye ca caityeṣu rathyāsu ca dīpamālām //
SA14bsa050_u:47: Ps_1.23 vādyāni divyaśrutisaṃgrahārthaṃ saṃbuddhaśīlāya ca gandhadānam /
SA14bsa050_u:49: Ps_1.24 dānaṃ rasānāṃ tu susaṃskṛtāṇāṃ rasārasāgratvaparigrahāya /
SA14bsa050_u:53: Ps_1.26 dadāti putrān duhitṛḥ priyāśca bodhipriyatvādanavadyadānam /
SA14bsa050_u:61: Ps_1.30 duḥkhāpagāyāmatiśīghragāyāṃ magnasya lokasya kathaṃ na dadyām /
SA14bsa050_u:65: Ps_1.32 utkṛtya māṃsāni saśoṇitāni dadāti kāruṇyavaśena nāthaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:66: bhūmyagnivāyvambuvadeva me syāllokopajīvyaḥ katham eṣa kāyaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:69: Ps_1.34 majjānamapyadbhutavīraceṣṭo dadāti lokasya kathaṃ na kuryām /
SA14bsa050_u:73: Ps_1.36 anviṣya bhogānviṣameṇa nāsau dadāti notpīḍanayā parasya /
SA14bsa050_u:75: Ps_1.37 na ca praṇīte sati rūkṣadānam adakṣiṇīyā iti vāvamanya /
SA14bsa050_u:77: Ps_1.38 naivonnatiṃ śīlavate prayacchan viparyayaṃ gacchati netarasmai /
SA14bsa050_u:78: nātmānamutkarṣati naiva nindāṃ karoti so 'nyasya samaprayogaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:80: na krodhadoṣopahataṃ dadāti naivānutāpaṃ kurute sa dattvā //
SA14bsa050_u:81: Ps_1.40 na ślāghyamāno vipulaṃ dadāti nāślāghyamāno 'nyataraṃ dadāti /
SA14bsa050_u:82: na yācakānāmupaghātadānaṃ yad vā bhaved vipratipattihetuḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:83: Ps_1.41 nākāladānaṃ sa dadāti kiṃcid dadāti kāle viṣame 'pi naiva /
SA14bsa050_u:85: Ps_1.42 nāsau mukhollokanayā dadāti na kīrtiśabdāya na hāsyahetoḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:86: paryāptametacca mameti naivaṃ yadvā vihiṃsāhasitaṃ pareṣām //
SA14bsa050_u:87: Ps_1.43 sarvajñabhāvāpariṇāmitaṃ vā sagarhitaṃ vā sa dadāti naiva /
SA14bsa050_u:88: tato 'sya tat pāramitābhidhānaṃ parāṃ viśuddhiṃ samupaiti dānam //
SA14bsa050_u:89: Ps_1.44 dānodbhavaṃ tasya ca puṇyarāśiṃ lokāt samagrādapi piṇḍitāni /
SA14bsa050_u:91: Ps_1.45 pañcasvabhijñāsu viniścitātmā lokāya yadvarṣati dānavarṣam /
SA14bsa050_u:92: samantatastasya kutaḥ pramāṇaṃ parikṣayo vā satatapravṛtteḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:93: Ps_1.46 yadakṣayāṇāṃ jagatāṃ hitāya jñānasya hetuśca yadakṣayasya /
SA14bsa050_u:94: traidhātukena kṣayiṇā na tacca saṃlipyate vyomavadambudena //
SA14bsa050_u:95: Ps_1.47 tacchūnyatākārasamāhitaṃ ca nimittadoṣaiḥ parivarjitaṃ ca /
SA14bsa050_u:97: Ps_1.48 asmin punaḥ satpuruṣāvadāne dāne nidāne sukhavistārāṇām /
SA14bsa050_u:98: cikīrṣatā yogamanityasaṃjñā bhogeṣu kāryā karuṇā ca loke //
SA14bsa050_u:99: Ps_1.49 bhogānanityānabhivīkṣamānaḥ sātmyaṃ gatāyāṃ ca tataḥ kṛpāyām /
SA14bsa050_u:100: sa niścayaṃ gacchati dīyate yad etān madīyāṃ na tu yadgṛhe me //
SA14bsa050_u:101: Ps_1.50 yaddattam asmān na bhayaṃ kadā cid gehe yadasmādbhayamabhyupaiti /
SA14bsa050_u:102: sādhāraṇaṃ rakṣyamatarpakaṃ ca datte tu naite prabhavantyanarthāḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:103: Ps_1.51 sukhaṃ paratrāpi karoti dattam ihaiva duḥkhaṃ prakarotyadattam /
SA14bsa050_u:104: ulkāsvabhāvaṃ hi dhanaṃ narāṇām atyajyamānaṃ vyasanaṃ dadāti //
SA14bsa050_u:105: Ps_1.52 adīyamānaṃ nidhanaṃ prayāti nidhānatāṃ yāti hi dīyamānam /
SA14bsa050_u:106: dhanasya niḥsāralaghoḥ sa sāro yaddīyate lokahitonmukhena //
SA14bsa050_u:108: prāyo viyogo hi parigrahebhyo dānādbhavatyabhyudayo yaśaśca //
SA14bsa050_u:109: Ps_1.54 dattaṃ na tatkleśaparigrahāya kleśāya mātsaryamanāryadharmaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:110: yaddīyate satpatha eṣa tasmād ato 'nyathā kāpathamāhurāryāḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:111: Ps_1.55 abhyāgate yācanake ca tena saṃbodhisaṃbhāravivṛddhihetau /
SA14bsa050_u:115: Ps_1.57 sa cetpunaryācanake 'pi labdhe dātuṃ na śaknotyatidurbalatvāt /
SA14bsa050_u:116: tenānuneyo madhureṇa sāmnā sa yācakaḥ syānna yathā samanyuḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:117: Ps_1.58 kāryaśca mātsaryavinigrahāya mohaprahāṇāya ca tena yatnaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:118: tathā yathā yācanakaḥ kadā cid vaimukhyadīno na tato vyāpaiti //
SA14bsa050_u:119: Ps_1.59 saṃbodhicittaṃ kuta eva tasya dravye 'pi yo matsaramabhyupaiti /
SA14bsa050_u:120: vāsaḥ sucittasya hi nāsti doṣairambhonidhānasya śavairyathaiva //
SA14bsa050_u:121: Ps_1.60 tasmāt tyaktvā sarvataḥ sarvadoṣān bodhiprārthī sarvadā sarvadaḥ syāt /
SA14bsa050_u:122: trātuṃ lokānekavīraḥ kva cittaṃ ceṣṭā dainyānūrjiteyaṃ kva caiva //
SA14bsa050_u:123: Ps_1.61 mūlaṃ dānasyāsya saṃbodhicittaṃ tanna tyājyaṃ ditsatā dānamīdṛk /
SA14bsa050_u:129: svameva śīlaṃ pariśodhyamādau śīlaṃ hi śakterbalamādadhāti //
SA14bsa050_u:130: Ps_2.2 loke tathā prema niveśayeta svapne 'pi na droharuciryathā syāt /
SA14bsa050_u:133: kurvīta lokasya hitārthakartā kāyena ceṣṭāḥ sujanasya ceṣṭāḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:136: Ps_2.5 kāryaṃ prayatnena mayā yadasmai tatsādhanena svayameva labdham /
SA14bsa050_u:138: Ps_2.6 mamaiva daurabalyamidaṃ yadeṣa kleśāsvatantraḥ svahitaṃ na vetti /
SA14bsa050_u:140: Ps_2.7 kudṛṣṭisaṃjñaṃ ca tamaḥpratānaṃ jñānaprakāśairmanaso nirasya /
SA14bsa050_u:142: Ps_2.8 svargasya mokṣasya ca satpathebhyo naivoccalet karmapathebhya ebhyaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:144: Ps_2.9 samāsataḥ śīlamidaṃ vadanti yaḥ saṃvaraḥ kāyavacomanastaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:145: kārtsnyena cātraiva yataḥ sa tasmād etānyayatnena viśodhayecca //
SA14bsa050_u:147: yā vāsanā doṣakṛtāsya citte tāṃ cāprayatnena samucchinatti //
SA14bsa050_u:148: Ps_2.11 maitrīviśeṣānugate ca citte vairānubandheṣu śamam gateṣu /
SA14bsa050_u:150: Ps_2.12 kurvanti rakṣāṃsyapi cāsya rakṣāṃ na durgatibhyo bhayamabhyupaiti /
SA14bsa050_u:154: Ps_2.14 anādadānastu parasya bhogān āpnoti bhogānmahataḥ paratra /
SA14bsa050_u:161: prāpnoti lokastutibhiḥ samantāt kīrtiṃ diganteṣu vikīryamāṇam //
SA14bsa050_u:162: Ps_2.18 na cāpi kaṃ citpramadāsu rāgaṃ karoti mātṛriva vīkṣamāṇaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:165: ādeyasiddhyā vacanasya sattvān karoti dharmābhimukhān ayatnāt //
SA14bsa050_u:166: Ps_2.20 divaukasāṃ ca priyatāṃ yadeti satyapriyaścitramidaṃ na tādṛk /
SA14bsa050_u:168: Ps_2.21 pramāṇabhūto bhavati priyaśca yallaukikānāmidamatra citram /
SA14bsa050_u:169: prāyeṇa loko hi guṇairdaridraḥ svenānumānena parānminoti //
SA14bsa050_u:172: Ps_2.23 bhrājiṣṇunā durgatitārakeṇa jñānena paśyaṃśca samāsamāni /
SA14bsa050_u:174: Ps_2.24 evaṃ sa śuddhaprakṛtiḥ krameṇa na śaṅkyate 'nyairna ca śaṅkate 'nyān /
SA14bsa050_u:177: paiśūnyamuktasya bhavatyabhedyā śraddhā ca dharme pratipattisārā //
SA14bsa050_u:183: lokasya ca premṇi virūḍhamūle saivāsya vāggrāhyataratvameti //
SA14bsa050_u:184: Ps_2.29 ataśca lokāñchataśo vinīya teṣāṃ samāvṛtya ca duḥkhamārgam /
SA14bsa050_u:185: na durgatiṃ gacchati puṇyakarmā dharmo hi rakṣeha paratra caiva //
SA14bsa050_u:186: Ps_2.30 dūrādapi vyaktapadānunādaḥ śrīmān adūre 'pi sukhasvabhāvaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:188: Ps_2.31 abaddhavākyādvirataḥ priyatvam ekāntato yāti vicakṣaṇānām /
SA14bsa050_u:189: satyābhidhāne kramate sabuddhiḥ prāpnoti māhātmyam akṛtrimaṃ ca //
SA14bsa050_u:190: Ps_2.32 asmācca puṇyān munirājabhāve gāmbhīryagūḍhān paripṛcchamānaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:191: praśnānanekānapi caikakāle niḥsaṃśayaṃ vyākurute sa vācā //
SA14bsa050_u:192: Ps_2.33 pretyeha cānarthaphalairavandhyāṃ vandhyāmabhidhyāṃ samapāsya buddhyā /
SA14bsa050_u:194: Ps_2.34 citte viśuddhe ca tadāśrayāṇi vākkāyakarmāṇi śucībhavanti /
SA14bsa050_u:197: prayāti rājñāmapi saṃmatatvam adhṛṣyatāṃ ca pratigarvitānām //
SA14bsa050_u:198: Ps_2.36 vaikalyamāyānti na cendriyāṇi satkarmanirvṛttabalāni tasya /
SA14bsa050_u:202: Ps_2.38 hiṃsātmake vigrahasaṃhite vā karmaṇyanāryācarite śaṭhe vā /
SA14bsa050_u:203: na cāsya buddhiḥ kramate kadācin maitrīsukhāsvādaviśeṣalābhāt //
SA14bsa050_u:204: Ps_2.39 loke vrajatyāryajanena sāmyaṃ saṃmānyate daivatavajjanena /
SA14bsa050_u:206: Ps_2.40 hitābhinandī jagatāmayatnāt prasādayatyeva ca mānasāni /
SA14bsa050_u:210: Ps_2.42 kudṛṣṭipaṅkakramaṇaṃ lasaṃstu prāpnoti kalyāṇahṛdaḥ sahāyān /
SA14bsa050_u:211: karmasvako 'stīti ca karma pāpaṃ viśasyamāno 'pi karoti naiva //
SA14bsa050_u:212: Ps_2.43 bhavatyakampyā ca jiṇe 'sya bhaktirnāyasyate kautukamaṅgalaiśca /
SA14bsa050_u:213: ārye ca mārge labhate pratiṣṭhāṃ viśeṣagāmitvamato 'bhyupaiti //
SA14bsa050_u:214: Ps_2.44 satkāyadṛṣṭyuccalitaḥ sa yāti na durgatiṃ hetuparikṣayeṇa /
SA14bsa050_u:218: Ps_2.46 imāṃ vibhūtiṃ guṇaratnacitrāṃ ślāghyāṃ svayaṃgrāhaguṇābhirāmām /
SA14bsa050_u:219: ko nāma vidvān na samādadīta viśeṣataḥ sattvahitābhilāṣī //
SA14bsa050_u:220: Ps_2.47 divyābhirāmā manujeṣu saṃpat prakṛṣṭasaukhyaikarasā ca divyā /
SA14bsa050_u:221: śīlādyadi syāt kimivātra citraṃ yasmāt prarohantyapi buddhadharmāḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:226: Ps_2.50 na cchidradoṣaiḥ parijarjaraṃ vā strīkelisaṃvāhanavīkṣaṇādyaiḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:227: na durjanakleśaparigrahād vā kurvīta śīlaṃ śabalaprakāram //
SA14bsa050_u:236: Ps_2.55 ślāghyeṣu sarveṣvapi vartamānaḥ śīlānukūleṣu guṇodayeṣu /
SA14bsa050_u:240: Ps_2.57 śīlaṃ guṇābhyāsavidhiṃ vadanti saṃbodhicitte ca guṇāḥ samagrāḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:241: abhyasyate tacca kṛpāguṇena kāruṇyaśīlaḥ satataṃ tataḥ syāt //
SA14bsa050_u:242: Ps_2.58 yanniśritaṃ kāmabhave 'pi naiva saṃtiṣṭhate naiva ca rūpadhātau /
SA14bsa050_u:244: Ps_2.59 yo lokadhātuṣvamiteṣu sattvāñchīle pratiṣṭhāpayiṣuḥ samagrān /
SA14bsa050_u:245: niṣevate lokahitāya śīlaṃ taducyate pāramiteti tajjñaiḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:246: Ps_2.60 śīlaṃ viśeṣādhigamasya mārgo dāyādyabhūtaṃ karuṇātmakānām /
SA14bsa050_u:249: tulyākṛtibhyo 'pi pṛthagjanebhyaḥ śīlaṃ viśeṣaṃ kurute narāṇām //
SA14bsa050_u:256: Ps_2.65 tasmān na durgatibhayena na rājyahetorna svargasaṃpadabhilāṣasamudbhavena /
SA14bsa050_u:257: seveta śīlamamalaṃ na hi tattathā syāllokārthasiddhiparamastu bhajeta śīlam //
SA14bsa050_u:261: Ps_3.1 saṃmohanīṃ manmathapakṣamāyāṃ prāhuḥ sukhāṃ caiva vimokṣamāyām /
SA14bsa050_u:262: tasyāṃ na kuryāt kaiva kṣamāyāṃ prayatnamekāntahitakṣamāyām //
SA14bsa050_u:263: Ps_3.2 parāparādheṣu sadānabhijñā vyavasthitiḥ sattvavatāṃ manojñā /
SA14bsa050_u:265: Ps_3.3 parārthamabhyudyatamānasānāṃ dīkṣāṃ titikṣāṃ prathamāṃ vadanti /
SA14bsa050_u:266: seturjalānīva hi roṣadoṣaḥ śreyāṃsi lokasya samāvṛṇoti //
SA14bsa050_u:269: Ps_3.5 kṣamāmaye varmaṇi sajjanānāṃ vikuṇṭhitā durjanavākyabāṇāḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:273: Ps_3.7 sattvasya gāmbhīryamayasya sāro ghanāgamaḥ krodhanidāghaśāntyai /
SA14bsa050_u:279: Ps_3.10 śubhā paratrāpi hite samṛddhirjagaddhitārthasya parā vivṛddhiḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:281: Ps_3.11 saṃsāradoṣairna ca cchedameti sattvān kṛpāsnigdhamavekṣamāṇaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:287: Ps_3.14 tīvraprakārairapi viprakārairna vikriyāṃ yānti satāṃ manāṃsi /
SA14bsa050_u:289: Ps_3.15 sa kṣāntidhīreṇa ca mānasena kaṣṭāni saṃdarśayate tapāṃsi /
SA14bsa050_u:290: darponnatiṃ tīrthakṛtāṃ manaḥsu nīcaiḥ kariṣyan hitakāmyayaiva //
SA14bsa050_u:293: Ps_3.17 kṛpāsanāthāni satāṃ manāṃsi kṣāntyā kṛtasvastyayanakriyāṇi /
SA14bsa050_u:294: naṣṭātmadṛṣṭiṇi parāpakārān na vikriyāṃ yānti guṇānurāgāt //
SA14bsa050_u:297: Ps_3.19 vikalpasanniśrayasaṃśritāyāṃ kṣāntyāṃ na tu syāccalitāvakāśaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:299: Ps_3.20 vikalpaśāntiṃ paramārthatastu kṣāntiṃ kṣamātattvavido vadanti /
SA14bsa050_u:301: Ps_3.21 cakṣuḥ kim ākrośati cakṣuretacchrotrādi vākrośati kiṃ tadādi /
SA14bsa050_u:302: yaivaṃ kṣamā sāyatanānvavekṣā na kṣāntireṣā paramārthatastu //
SA14bsa050_u:303: Ps_3.22 vaktā vacaścaitadanityameva śrutirvikalpo 'pi ca yo mamāyam /
SA14bsa050_u:305: Ps_3.23 kartāpakārasya na kaścidasti naivāsti kaścitkriyāte ca yasya /
SA14bsa050_u:309: Ps_3.25 yadyesā saṃmohamahāgraheṇa paryastacetā nanu nāhamevam /
SA14bsa050_u:310: ityunnate cāvanate ca citte kṣāntiprakarṣasya kuto 'vakāśaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:312: kuryāṃ kathaṃ kasya ca kāṃ ca pīḍām eṣāpi na kṣāntiratiprakṛṣṭā //
SA14bsa050_u:313: Ps_3.27 yadyesā matpāpaparikṣayārthaṃ na vīkṣate svāmapi dharmapīḍām /
SA14bsa050_u:314: asmān na kalyāṇataraṃ hi mitram asāvapi kṣāntyupacārā eva //
SA14bsa050_u:315: Ps_3.28 karmasvatāṃ eva hi vīkṣamāṇastitikṣate tadguṇadarśanācca /
SA14bsa050_u:317: Ps_3.29 anityaduḥkhāśuciniḥsvabhāvatā mama kṣamante na tu tadviparyayāḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:318: iyaṃ vipakṣapraśamakṣamā kṣamā dvayapravṛtterna tu pāramārthikī //
SA14bsa050_u:319: Ps_3.30 ayatnatattvārthavicakṣaṇo janaḥ paropakāreṣu yataḥ pravartate /
SA14bsa050_u:320: kṣamā na caivaṃ samatāṃ sameti yā yataḥ kṣamaivaṃ na vikalpanakṣayā //
SA14bsa050_u:321: Ps_3.31 nirodham āyānti yadā tvaśeṣatāḥ samādhikanyūnavikalpanakramāḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:323: Ps_3.32 svataḥ parasmādubhayādahetuto yathā na bhāvāḥ prabhavanti ke cana /
SA14bsa050_u:324: svataḥ parasmād ubhayād ahetutastathā na bhāvā vibhavanti ke cana //
SA14bsa050_u:325: Ps_3.33 naṣṭād anaṣṭād ubhayāc na nobhayān na jātu kāryaṃ khalu vidyate kva cit /
SA14bsa050_u:326: tathāpi kāryaṃ samudeti vastuno yetthaṃ kṣamā sā dvayavarjitā kṣamā //
SA14bsa050_u:327: Ps_3.34 sato 'sato vāsti na janma janmanā vinā nirodho 'pi na kasya cit kva cit /
SA14bsa050_u:329: Ps_3.35 avāpya yāṃ vyākriyate sahasraśo jinairasau nāma jino bhaviṣyati /
SA14bsa050_u:330: pravartate lokahitakriyāvidhiḥ samāhitasyaiva ca tasya sarvadā //
SA14bsa050_u:331: Ps_3.36 yāvacca bhāvābhiniviṣṭabuddhiratra dvayaṃ tāvadupaiti mohāt /
SA14bsa050_u:332: tathānimittaṃ ca vimokṣaheturdure bhavatyasya yathā kṣiteḥ kham //
SA14bsa050_u:334: tathā pariṣkāravidhau svacetasi prakarṣiṇi jñānabale tathāyuṣi //
SA14bsa050_u:335: Ps_3.38 avāpya caitadvaśitāmayaṃ dhanaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ akṣiṣṇu parārthasādhanam /
SA14bsa050_u:336: janasya kṛcchreṣu patiṣyataḥ sataḥ sa jāyate dhāraṇakāraṇaṃ vibhuḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:337: Ps_3.39 tasmāt parārthamahatīṃ dhuramudvahadbhiḥ kṣānterupāyavidhireṣa sadānugamyaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:338: atra sthitasya hi bhavanti parārthacittāḥ sarvāḥ; kriyā guṇaphalābharaṇābhirāmāḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:339: Ps_3.40 asyāṃ hi bhaktirapi yā pravirūḍhamūlā tāmabhyasanti munayo munirājabhāve /
SA14bsa050_u:340: śraddhānuviddhamanasāṃ na hi dharmamārge dṛṣṭo manoratharathasya yato 'kṣabhaṅgaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:344: Ps_4.1 sarvaṃsahe kṣāntibale ca rūḍhe sarvādbhutānyārabhate sa śauryāt /
SA14bsa050_u:345: vīryeṇa kāryāntamahābalena yasmāt sa devānapi yātyatītya //
SA14bsa050_u:347: aprāpyarūpaṃ tu na kiṃ cid asti khedānabhijñena parākrameṇa //
SA14bsa050_u:348: Ps_4.3 ārabdham evotsahate na hīna ārabhya madhyastu viṣādameti /
SA14bsa050_u:350: Ps_4.4 prāyeṇa dainyopahato jano 'yaṃ svādhīnavīryo 'pi gurusvakāryaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:354: Ps_4.6 utpādayeyaṃ yadi bodhicittam ekaikametena parākrameṇa /
SA14bsa050_u:356: Ps_4.7 ekaikamevaṃ yadi bodhicittaṃ prāpyeta saṃbhāravidhiśca śeṣaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:360: Ps_4.9 padbhyāṃ atikramya kukūlakalpāṃ kṛtsnāṃ mahīmāyudhasaṃvṛtāṃ vā /
SA14bsa050_u:361: yaddraṣṭum apyutsahate munīndrān pātuṃ śivaṃ dharmarasāyanaṃ vā //
SA14bsa050_u:362: Ps_4.10 saṃsārapaṅkājjanatā mayeyam uddhṛtya nirvāṇasukhe niveṣyā /
SA14bsa050_u:364: Ps_4.11 yad vā hitārthaṃ kramate parasya puṇyāni vā lokahitāya cittam /
SA14bsa050_u:366: Ps_4.12 puṇyasya cotpādasamānakālaṃ saṃbuddhabhāve pariṇāmanaṃ yat /
SA14bsa050_u:368: Ps_4.13 mahatsu vāmbhaḥsu yathā niṣikto naivodabinduḥ kṣayamabhyupaiti /
SA14bsa050_u:369: saṃbuddhabhāve pariṇāmitasya tathaiva puṇyasya na saṃkṣayo 'sti //
SA14bsa050_u:370: Ps_4.14 tathā hi kāruṇyaviśuddhabuddhiḥ sarvajñabhāvāya phalantyamūni /
SA14bsa050_u:371: puṇyāni lokasya carācarasyetyevaṃ sa tānyārabhate susattvaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:372: Ps_4.15 mahātrisāhasragataṃ janaughaṃ nirvāpayedekadine na kaścit /
SA14bsa050_u:373: kalpaṃ tathā naiva ca sattvadhātostenāpi kiṃ cit paripācitaṃ syāt //
SA14bsa050_u:374: Ps_4.16 śrutvāpi sattvākṣayatāṃ imāṃ yaḥ sattvānaśeṣān vininīṣureva /
SA14bsa050_u:378: Ps_4.18 śatena bhūyo guṇitena tena puṇyena romāspadasaṃśritena /
SA14bsa050_u:384: Ps_4.21 ūrṇābhinirvṛttikarmaṃ ca puṇyaṃ śatapramāṇairguṇitaṃ sahasraiḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:386: Ps_4.22 ayaṃ mayā puṇyanidhiḥ parārthaṃ saṃceya ityuttamabodhicitte /
SA14bsa050_u:388: Ps_4.23 sarve 'pi sattvā yadi lokadhātau pratyekabuddhaiḥ sadṛśā bhaveyuḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:389: jñānena tebhyo 'bhyadhikaprabhāvaḥ kṣāntistha eko 'pi hi bodhisattvaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:390: Ps_4.24 tathaiva ca kṣāntibalasthitebhyo viśeṣaṃ āyātyavivartanīyaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:391: aśrāntavīryaḥ kuśalaprayoge yallaukike caiva taduttare ca //
SA14bsa050_u:392: Ps_4.25 tebhyaḥ puṇaścādhika eva dūraṃ ya ekajātipratibaddhabodhiḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:393: ka eva vādo dṛḍhavīryavatsu ye bodhimūle prathamaṃ niṣaṇṇāḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:394: Ps_4.26 tādṛgvidhajñānaviśuddhipūrṇaḥ syād yadyaśeṣena ca lokadhātuḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:395: yāyāt kalāṃ so 'pi na bodhimūle sthitasya mārātikṛtāntyajāteḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:399: avyāhatājñaḥ paracittacāre prajñāvabhāsaṃ ca nabho viśālam //
SA14bsa050_u:400: Ps_4.29 sarveṣu sattveṣu ca tasya mātrā samānahārdā karuṇābhyudeti /
SA14bsa050_u:404: Ps_4.31 vīryaṃ tridhā yaḥ kuśalaprayogastasmācca vākkāyamanoviśeṣāḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:406: Ps_4.32 yo bodhicittapraṇayaḥ samaśca kṛpā ca nairātmagatau kṣamā ca /
SA14bsa050_u:408: Ps_4.33 saṃsārapaṅke yadakhinnatā ca traidhātukasyaiva ca nopalabdhiḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:409: sarvasvadānaṃ na ca tena mānaḥ samagraśikṣasya na śikṣayā ca //
SA14bsa050_u:414: Ps_4.36 yā deśanā caiva yathāśrutānāṃ jñānaṃ ca dharmānabhilāpyatāyām /
SA14bsa050_u:415: pañcasvabhijñāsu ca yatprabhutvam abhyāsamātrā ca taduttarāyām //
SA14bsa050_u:416: Ps_4.37 yadṛddhipādeṣvabhinirhṛtatvaṃ paṭvī na cāyāsamayī kriyā ca /
SA14bsa050_u:417: samyakprahāṇeṣu ca yaḥ prayogaḥ śubhāśubhādeva ca yā vimuktiḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:418: Ps_4.38 yatkauśalaṃ cendriyanirṇayeṣu nirindriyān paśyati yacca dharmān /
SA14bsa050_u:419: mārgasya saṃbhāravimārgaṇaṃ ca na cāsya kiṃ cid gamanaṃ kutaścit //
SA14bsa050_u:422: Ps_4.40 nimittakarmasvapi na pravartate vitiṣṭhate jñānamaye ca karmaṇi /
SA14bsa050_u:423: kṛpāguṇādyan na jahāti saṃskṛtaṃ na coruvīryo 'pi patatyasaṃskṛte //
SA14bsa050_u:426: Ps_4.42 vrajantyavandhyā yadaharniśaṃ kriyā guṇairna hāniṃ yadutpaiti mauśalīm /
SA14bsa050_u:428: Ps_4.43 yaśo viśālam ca sukhaṃ sukhodayaṃ vinītakārpaṇyamanastvamuttamam /
SA14bsa050_u:429: guṇāśca teṣāmiha dṛṣṭadhārmikā bhavanti vīryāditi ko 'tra vismayaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:431: vīryavyāpāśrayadṛḍhāḥ puruṣā na syād ataḥ ka iva vīryaparaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:435: Ps_5.1 atha dhyānavidhau yogaṃ kuryāj jñānavivṛddhaye /
SA14bsa050_u:447: Ps_5.7 yatra kva cana vā deśe saṃsargakleśavarjite /
SA14bsa050_u:449: Ps_5.8 upasthāpya smṛtimayīṃ rakṣāṃ abhimukhīṃ hṛdi /
SA14bsa050_u:451: Ps_5.9 prajñāparicayasyāyāṃ kālo me na tu nirvṛteḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:452: na hi sattvān anirvāpya svayaṃ nirvātum utsahe //
SA14bsa050_u:455: Ps_5.11 na hi viśramya viśramya mathnannagnimavāpnuyāt /
SA14bsa050_u:457: Ps_5.12 ekatraiva ca badhnīyād dṛḍham ālambane manaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:477: Ps_5.22 pitṛṇāmapi putreṣu putrāṇāṃ ca pitṛṣvapi /
SA14bsa050_u:481: Ps_5.24 iha paryeṣṭiduḥkhasya paratra narakasya ca /
SA14bsa050_u:482: hetubhūtā yataḥ kāmāḥ kāmayeta na tān ataḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:485: Ps_5.26 ātmakāmairapi ca ye sarvathāpi vivarjitāḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:487: Ps_5.27 tṛptireṣāṃ na saṃprāptyā nāhanyahani sevayā /
SA14bsa050_u:499: Ps_5.33 utplavaṃ manaso dṛṣṭvā prīteratha virajya saḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:503: Ps_5.35 abhijñā labhate pañca sa ca tatrānugāminīḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:507: Ps_5.37 sa hi matsariṇastyāge śīle tadvikalānapi /
SA14bsa050_u:513: Ps_5.40 atha pāpakṛtaḥ sattvān patato narakādiṣu /
SA14bsa050_u:517: Ps_5.42 tīvramāyāti kāruṇyaṃ kāruṇyān na pramādyati /
SA14bsa050_u:523: Ps_5.45 tatra ca praṇidhistasya sukhenaiva samṛdhyati /
SA14bsa050_u:532: vīkṣya vrajati kāruṇyaṃ teṣāṃ vāñcanayā tayā //
SA14bsa050_u:549: Ps_5.58 praśamottarayā muniśriyā kva cid atyārthaviśiṣṭaceṣṭayā /
SA14bsa050_u:552: dhanado dhanado yathā kva cit kuha cidbrahmavadadbhutadyutiḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:558: garuḍadhvajarājadṛk kva cit kuha ciccaiva halāyudhadyutiḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:561: Ps_5.64 kuha cid dhutabhuṅmarutvatāṃ vapuṣānyatra narāśrayāśinām /
SA14bsa050_u:562: vāruṇadyutim udvahan kva cit kuha cinmanmathacāruvigrahaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:564: kva cid eva tapodhanaśriyaṃ vidadhat kāmaviraktamānasaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:565: Ps_5.66 hṛdayāni harannṛṇāṃ kva cid guruśiṣyakṣitipālavṛttibhiḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:571: Ps_5.69 kuśale sthitirapyanūrjitā kim ahāniḥ śithilavratocitā /
SA14bsa050_u:573: Ps_5.70 sulabhaśca samādhirudyamād anurakṣā punarasya duṣkarā /
SA14bsa050_u:575: Ps_5.71 manasaḥ parivṛttilāghavaṃ paramaṃ tatra na viśvasedataḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:582: vyatiyāti tu māragocaraṃ tamanarthaṃ praśamayya sarvathā //
SA14bsa050_u:583: Ps_5.75 na hi niśrayadośaduṣito bhavati dhyānavidhirviśuddhaye /
SA14bsa050_u:584: calatānugato hi niśrayaḥ sakhaṭuṅkastata eva kathyate //
SA14bsa050_u:586: na hi kiṃ cid udeti kutra cit sadasatsaṃbhavayuktyasaṃbhavāt //
SA14bsa050_u:589: Ps_5.78 kurute sa ca laukikīṃ kriyāṃ jagadekāntahitānuvartinīm /
SA14bsa050_u:597: Ps_6.2 kriyāsu sāmarthyaguṇaṃ hi teṣāṃ prajñaiva vistāriṇamādadhāti /
SA14bsa050_u:599: Ps_6.3 kriyāsvayogyāni śarīrayantrāṇyāyurviyuktāni yathā na bhānti /
SA14bsa050_u:600: tathaiva kāryāṇi na bhānti loke prajñāviyogena jadīkṛtāni //
SA14bsa050_u:602: guṇāguṇān vetti hi tatsanāthaḥ kleśakṣaye naipuṇametyataśca //
SA14bsa050_u:604: tyāgaṃ parārthaṃ hi vadanti dānaṃ śeṣastu vṛddhyārthamiva prayogaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:606: naivonnatiṃ nāvanatiṃ prayānti bhaiṣajyavṛkṣā iva nirviklapāḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:607: Ps_6.7 evaṃ sa bhūmiṃ prathamāmupaiti lokottarasyārthavidhipratiṣṭhām /
SA14bsa050_u:609: Ps_6.8 prāyeṇa yasyāṃ balacakravartī bhavatyasaṃhāryamatiśca bodheḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:611: Ps_6.9 yasyāṃ prakṛtyaiva viśuddhaśīlaścaturmahādvīpapatiḥ sa bhūtvā /
SA14bsa050_u:613: Ps_6.10 tataḥ paraṃ kāmiṣu daivateṣu loke 'pi ca dvitrisahasrasaṃkhye /
SA14bsa050_u:614: aiśvaryamāpnoti tataḥ paraṃ ca bhūmiṃ viśodhya prabhavāṃ prabhāyāḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:615: Ps_6.11 śīlasya śuddhiḥ kuta eva tasya yaḥ prajñayā nāpahṛtāndhakāraḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:616: prāyeṇa śīlāni hi tadviyogād āmarṣadoṣaiḥ kaluṣīkriyante //
SA14bsa050_u:617: Ps_6.12 nātmārthamapyasti tu yasya śīlaṃ prājñasya tasyāsti kathaṃ parārtham /
SA14bsa050_u:618: yo dṛṣṭadoṣo bhavabandhanānāṃ lokān samastāṃstata ujjihīrṣuḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:619: Ps_6.13 prajñāvipakṣairhṛdi soparāge kṣamāguṇaḥ kena dhṛtiṃ labheta /
SA14bsa050_u:621: Ps_6.14 prajñānvitānāṃ tu parāpakārāḥ kṣamāguṇāḥ sthairyakarā bhavanti /
SA14bsa050_u:623: Ps_6.15 niṣkevalaṃ vīryamapi śramāya prajñāsanāthasya tu tasya kārye /
SA14bsa050_u:625: Ps_6.16 yasmāt paraṃ sūkṣamataraṃ na kiṃ cid yannaipuṇānāṃ paramaḥ prakarṣaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:627: Ps_6.17 tad dhyānamekāntasukhābhirāmaṃ kathaṃ pravekṣyantyastāṃ manāṃsi /
SA14bsa050_u:629: Ps_6.18 prajñānirudyogamaterhi dṛṣṭirnāyāti śuddhiṃ tadṛte na śīlam /
SA14bsa050_u:631: Ps_6.19 prājñastu doṣādbhayamīkṣamāṇaḥ sukhānubaddhaṃ ca sukhaṃ guṇebhyaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:636: naiṣkāraṇorjasvalayā ca vṛttyā parārthacaryāsu samaṃ samantāt //
SA14bsa050_u:637: Ps_6.22 sāmānyamartheṣu ca darśayitvā premṇā vaśīkṛtya manāṃsi teṣām /
SA14bsa050_u:641: Ps_6.24 bhayāni sarvāṇi hi doṣajāni prajñā na doṣaiḥ sahavāsameti /
SA14bsa050_u:643: Ps_6.25 sahasraraśmerudaye 'pi yāni tamāṃsi rundhanti jagadgatāni /
SA14bsa050_u:645: Ps_6.26 na tatra bhūyaḥ karaṇīyam asti yatra prabhā sā balatāmupaiti /
SA14bsa050_u:646: yugāntakālānalasaṃhṛte hi loke na dagdhavyakathāḥ prathante //
SA14bsa050_u:647: Ps_6.27 jyotīṃṣi sarvāṇyapi saṃhitāni prajñāprabhāṃ nālamathopayātum /
SA14bsa050_u:649: Ps_6.28 saṃpūrṇatāṃ yāti sukhena śikṣā śīlāya cittapraśamāya caiva /
SA14bsa050_u:651: Ps_6.29 yā skandhadhātvāyatanapravṛttau satyāśrayā pratyayitā parīkṣā /
SA14bsa050_u:655: Ps_6.31 prajñābalaṃ dīptataraprabhāvaṃ nālaṃ prasoḍhuṃ sabalo 'pi māraḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:656: prajñāṃśavo vibhramayānti cakṣurna draṣṭum īśo hi yataḥ sa eva //
SA14bsa050_u:657: Ps_6.32 kandarpanārācanipātasāhī prajñāmayaṃ varma vitatya citte /
SA14bsa050_u:659: Ps_6.33 adhīrasātmyaṃ bhayaviklavaṃ vā mūḍhocitaṃ śokaparigrahaṃ vā /
SA14bsa050_u:661: Ps_6.34 dīneṣu kārpaṇyamalīmasatvaṃ kṛtāspadaṃ rāgiṣu cāpalaṃ vā /
SA14bsa050_u:665: Ps_6.36 niveśya doṣakṣayadhīrasaumyāṃ bhavasya tasyopari dṛṣṭilakṣmīm /
SA14bsa050_u:669: Ps_6.38 avāpya yasmān muniyauvarājyaṃ samaṃ samantād visṛtātmabhāvaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:670: lokasya duḥkhaṃ praśamatyayatnād rajo mahāmegha iva pravṛṣṭaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:671: Ps_6.39 prajñāprabhāvopanataḥ sa sarvaḥ prabhāvisāraḥ sugatātmajānām /
SA14bsa050_u:672: ko vismayo vātra sutapriyāyā mātuḥ samīyādyadiyaṃ vibhūtiḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:673: Ps_6.40 daśaprakāro 'pi yadā munīnāṃ tadāśrayādeva balaprakarṣaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:675: Ps_6.41 śāstrāṇi cakṣuḥpratimāni loke nidhānabhūtāṃśca kalāviśeṣān /
SA14bsa050_u:677: Ps_6.42 paryāyacitraṃ ca vimokṣamārgaṃ tattacca lokasya hitopapādi /
SA14bsa050_u:680: na yadvirūpāṃ prakṛtiṃ vrajanti prajñā guṇāmātyasanāthatā sā //
SA14bsa050_u:681: Ps_6.44 paropakāraikarasā ca maitrī rāgoparāgaprativarjitā ca /
SA14bsa050_u:682: parasya duḥkheṣu parā dayā ca na śokabhārālasatāṃ gatā ca //
SA14bsa050_u:683: Ps_6.45 anuddhātatvaṃ mudite 'pi citte tamonirārambhamupekṣitaṃ ca /
SA14bsa050_u:685: Ps_6.46 ko nāma lokasya parārthasādhurduḥkhaikahetūni tamāṃsi hanyāt /
SA14bsa050_u:686: avyāhatā jñānaśayāśayeṣu prajñā na cet syādatisūryādīptiḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:687: Ps_6.47 tatprāptaye śrutam aśītivikalpacitraṃ saṃceyam āśrayasahaṃ gurumabhyupetya /
SA14bsa050_u:689: Ps_6.48 alpaśruto 'ndha iva vetti na bhāvanāyā mārgaṃ vicintayati kāni ca tadvihīnaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:690: tasmācchrutaṃ prati yateta tadāśrayā hi prajñā samudbhavati cintanabhāvanābhyām //
SA14bsa050_u:692: prajñāvivṛddhimabhitaḥ prayateta nityaṃ dhyānena tadguṇavivṛddhikareṇa caiva //
SA14bsa050_u:693: Ps_6.50 prajñābhyupāyavidhireṣa samāsatastu dhyānaṃ tadarthaniyataḥ śrutivistaraśca /
SA14bsa050_u:694: tābhyāṃ samudbhavati hi prabhavo guṇānāṃ prajñāprabhāsamudayo 'gnirivāraṇībhyāṃ //
SA14bsa050_u:696: tairāvṛto na hi vibhātyudayasthito 'pi toyāvalambijaladāntaritaḥ śaśīva //
SA14bsa050_u:700: mithyāvikalpapaṭutā vitathā ca dṛṣṭirmohāya tatpraśamanāya tu tadvipakṣāḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:701: Ps_6.54 skandheṣu sāyatanadhātuṣu satyayuktyor; hetudbhaveṣu śucayānavinirṇaye ca /
SA14bsa050_u:702: dharmeṣu kauśalamaśeṣata eva yacca prajñāprayogaviṣayo 'ṣṭavikalpa eṣaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:703: Ps_6.55 niḥsāraphenanicayairaviśeṣi rūpaṃ tisro 'pi budbudalavā iva vedanāśca /
SA14bsa050_u:704: saṃjñāpi kāmaguṇaviprasṛtān satṛṣṇān bālān mṛgāniva vilobhayate marīciḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:705: Ps_6.56 saṃskārajātirapi tulyaguṇā kadalyā vijñānato 'pi na ca yuktatarāsti māyā /
SA14bsa050_u:707: Ps_6.57 nātmā tadīyamapi cātra na kiṃ cid asti saṃghāta eṣa vividhāśūcisaṃnidhānaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:708: bālān pralambhayata eva ca sattvasaṃjñā svacchandaceṣṭa iva yantravidhau suyukte //
SA14bsa050_u:709: Ps_6.58 ātmā na cakṣurapi ca kṣaṇabhaṅguratvāt tadvan na cakṣuṣi na cātra yathaiva cakṣuḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:710: ādhyātmikāyatanaśeṣam aśeṣam evam ātmīyavastuviṣayo 'pi ca tadvivekī //
SA14bsa050_u:711: Ps_6.59 bāhyeṣu dhātuṣu śarīrasamāśritānāṃ nālpo 'pi lakṣaṇavirodhakṛto 'sti bhedaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:712: vijñānadhāturapi ca kṣaṇikaḥ sa nātmā tasmātparo 'pi ca nabhaḥkusumaiḥ samānaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:713: Ps_6.60 ityetadudbhavati kevalameva duḥkhaṃ tṛṣṇāvimūḍhamanaso vigmāttu tasyāḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:714: śāntiḥ parā bhavati tarṣaharastu mārgaḥ śīlaṃ samādhipariśuddhatayā ca dṛṣṭiḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:715: Ps_6.61 tattatpratītya bhavatīti viśuddhadṛṣṭirnāstyasti veti samupaiti sa naiva kiṃ cit /
SA14bsa050_u:716: māyāmayaṃ jagadidaṃ pratibhāti tasya tasmāt sukhādiṣu bhavatyavikāradhīraḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:717: Ps_6.62 āsīdbhaviṣyati ca yat tad apīdṛgeva kaḥ saṃbhavo yadasukhaṃ na bhaved bhavebhyaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:718: evaṃ vyatītaviṣayeṣvapi vītarāgo naivābhinandati bhavāṃśca bhaviṣyato 'pi //
SA14bsa050_u:719: Ps_6.63 ākārabhedaparuṣe puruṣo 'parādhī ko nāma gūḍhanakharasphuṭadṛṣṭicihne /
SA14bsa050_u:720: tatpraiṣyavṛttikapaṭānyanucintya rajyed viśvāsameva ca yathocitamatra yāyāt //
SA14bsa050_u:723: Ps_6.65 lokārthasādhanavidhāvasamartharūpaṃ yānadvayaṃ samavādhūya sa pūrvameva /
SA14bsa050_u:725: Ps_6.66 hīnociteṣu na matirnamati praṇītā saṃtiṣṭhate mahati nāmahatī kadā cit /
SA14bsa050_u:726: saṃsyandate śucibhireva śucisvabhāvaṃ tulyaistathānyadapi śāsvata eṣa yogaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:727: Ps_6.67 svapnopamāni vigaṇayya sukhāsukhāni saṃmohadoṣakṛpaṇāṃ janatāṃ ca teṣu /
SA14bsa050_u:728: ātmārtha eva gurutāṃ katham asya yāyād vyāpārabhāramavadhūya parārtharamyam //
SA14bsa050_u:731: Ps_6.69 prajñāviśuddhikaramuttamayānametat sarvajñatā tadudayā hi mahāmunīnām /
SA14bsa050_u:732: lokasya yā nayanatāmiva saṃprayāti dīptāṃśumaṇḍalatalotpatitā prabheva //
SA14bsa050_u:733: Ps_6.70 saṃsāradoṣabharanirmathito 'pi naiva prajñāvivecanatayā parikhīdyate yaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:734: nātmābhikhedapariviklavatāṃ sa yāti yānasya buddhaguṇasaṃjananasya loke //
SA14bsa050_u:736: tadgāminaṃ pariharanti ca yānamārgaṃ kiṃ nāma kāraṇamṛte śaṭhaceṣṭitebhyaḥ //
SA14bsa050_u:738: sarvajñayānamapayānam anarthapaṅkād ākroṣṭumarhati na cejjagato 'sya vairam //
SA14bsa050_u:740: cittaṃ narasya karuṇāmṛdu kasya na syāt tanmohadoṣaśamanāya dṛḍhaṃ ca vīryam //
SA14bsa050_u:741: Ps_6.74 prajñāyā janayati yaḥ parāṃ viśuddhiṃ nirmokṣaḥ kathamiva tasya dūrataḥ syāt /
SA14bsa050_u:742: naivāsmātparataramasti śīlam anyat tattasmād bhajata vimokṣakāṅkṣiṇo hi //
